author: mbluj
body:
#### PR description:

This PR restricts a call for a custom refit of PV with the BeamSpot constraint only to the `run2_nanoAOD_106Xv2` era.

Introduced change is virtual as previously used set of eras `run2_nanoAOD_ANY` contains only the `run2_nanoAOD_106Xv2` era, but it ensures that the refit will not be enabled on top of future Run-2 re-miniAOD samples (containing vertices fitted with the BeamSpot constraint) in a case of some new eras are added to the set.

#### PR validation:

Verified that python modification behaves as expected.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport is not planned.
title: Restrict refit of PV with BS to one Run-2 era only
